website_summaries.verdict: Retro kitten heel slingback that’s cute and comfortable.
pros: Low 2.5-inch heel is well-balanced for support
Soft suede or leather comes in fun colors
cons: Strap is elasticized rather than a buckle, so it cannot be adjusted

customer_reviews.title: Problematic heel strap
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable classic, perhaps a little dated in style. Still fine to rock them depending on your age and/or your outfit. Could be very sophisticated when styled with the right skirt or dress. I agree with the other reviewers who said the strap falls off the heel. I contemplated having a cobbler shorten the elastic to make them stay on more tightly, but this remedy has previously resulted in the straps causing heel blisters. So back to Amazon these delicate cuties went.
customer_reviews.author: ACH

customer_reviews.title: Gorgois silver shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are some beautiful shoes and the heel is that sweet spot 2” height which makes these the perfect height in which to walk. I bought the silver for a special occasion and I know other women will be envious. I didn’t have any issue keeping the heel strap on.
customer_reviews.author: Rockyb

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoe it just runs a little bit smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe it just runs a little bit smaller and I had to send it back. I wear a perfect size 10.
customer_reviews.author: curtis cooper

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true...
customer_reviews.text: Very confortable shoe. The heel is just right for a long day. Will pruchase in a diferente color.
customer_reviews.author: luzdarlin

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Sadly I had to return. I'm between sizes and these were a little too small.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy1

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the quality of the materials and they run about a half size big, but they are pretty and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fit was perfect-great style without the price!
customer_reviews.text: So pleasantly surprised! Beautiful style that reminds me of Manolo Blahnik's design without the obnoxious price. These shoes are perfect. I always have a problem with the width, and these shoes are just right. In fact, I just ordered a SECOND pair in black before they run out. Thank you Mr. Camuto!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but I was sent the wrong size. I'm a 6.5 and I was sent a 6. Needed it for a work function and there was no alternative. I still wore them. Amazingly, I got through the event quite well. However, I would prefer to have my correct size though.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Howell

customer_reviews.title: Back strap too loose
customer_reviews.text: The strap wouldn’t stay on my heel. I usually wear 7.5 but ordered 8. It fits great EXCEPT for the strap on heel & there’s no way to tighten it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and soft leather
customer_reviews.text: I always wear 5.5 but this time the pumps are at least one size too large.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable elegance
customer_reviews.text: Stunning silver shoe - ideal for my wedding guest outfit. Look elegant and stylish without being too high to walk far, and also good to dance in. I had comments on them - people were asking where I got them, so don’t get these if you want to fade into the background!
customer_reviews.author: Nautical

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are pointy toe and that it is a small heel and they are the most comfortable shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

customer_reviews.title: These are the best elegant work pumps ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best elegant work pumps ever. They look great; but more importantly these shoes are absolutely comfortable and you can walk in them for miles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Beil

customer_reviews.title: ... dots all over the shoe and it doesnt feel like leather. Not happy but too costly to return ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realise there are little gold dots all over the shoe and it doesnt feel like leather. Not happy but too costly to return from Australia.
customer_reviews.author: Janique

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe and felt comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe and felt comfortable. The problem is the strap doesn't stay up over the heel. They should have designed it to be adjustable. Had to return :(
customer_reviews.author: Javier Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look pretty but are loose and don't stay on foot . No good to dance in!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Boscacci

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were absolutely beautiful! Unfortunately I had to return them because rhetoric strap falls off ny narrow heels when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes!! Beautiful and extremely comfortable. Height of the heel is perfect. I shall order in another color as I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shoes and it fits very good !!! Will be ordering another!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Back strap fits very loose but otherwise a nice fitting, very pretty shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Corder-Buckle

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! The perfect red and so comfortable. I plan on buying in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this slingback shoes So comfortable suede is good n it's also good to the upper part length :))
customer_reviews.author: jenna na hyun jeon

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried these shoes would be too small, I have a large foot and not all shoes are made equally. These fit perfect, and are extremely comfortable. I normally don’t wear a heel like this I prefer boots or chunky heels. But I’m pleasantly surprised how these feel and wear. I’m going to buy another pair in a different color. most likely the silver. It’s hard to find heels that fit, feel and look as good as these do. The price point is awesome for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was very comfortable, more comfortable than ANY heeled shoe I ever tried. The fit was good too. Unfortunately, the heel straps did not stay on, they kept on falling down so I had to return it. I understand the designer wanted a modern, clean look for the shoe so they designed it without buckles for the strap but the style is very unpractical.
customer_reviews.author: ChinkyTop Contributor: Photography

product_meta.title: Vince Camuto Women's Kolissa Pump
product_meta.description:
Slingback pointed toe pump

Vince Camuto is a true footwear innovator, both of design and of industry. The designer and creator of the Camuto group, Vince Camuto produces many brands and styles, and Vince Camuto women's shoes are among the most beautiful and finely crafted footwear available.
feature_bullets: Complete your dinner look with these alluring Vince Camuto® Kolissa heels.
Easy slip-on wear with elastic slingback strap.

Synthetic lining. Lightly-padded footbed. Wrapped heel. Synthetic outsole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 2 1⁄2 in Weight: 6 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
